verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> happened לִתְשׁוּבַ֨ת <S%H8666><s%> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> And it came to pass after the year לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H6256><s%> at the time צֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> go forth הַמַּלְאֿכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> kings וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֡ד <S%H1732><s%> [to battle] that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָב֩ <S%H3097><s%> Joab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֨יו <S%H5650><s%> and his servants עִמּ֜וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> with him and all Israel וַיַּשְׁחִ֙תוּ֙ <S%H7843><s%> and they destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיָּצֻ֖רוּ <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רַבָּ֑ה <S%H7237><s%> Rabbah וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> But David יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> tarried still בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem ס

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> now when הָעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> evening וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> that David מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> from מִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <S%H4904><s%> from off his bed וַיִּתְהַלֵּךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and walked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on גַּ֣ג <S%H1406><s%> upon the roof בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> he saw אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> a woman רֹחֶ֖צֶת <S%H7364><s%> washing מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and from הַגָּ֑ג <S%H1406><s%> and from the roof וְהָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> herself and the woman טוֹבַ֥ת <S%H2896><s%> beautiful מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> to look upon מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [was] very

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיִּדְרֹ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> and enquired לָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> after the woman וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And [one] said הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּת־ שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H1339><s%> [Is] not this Bathsheba בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֱלִיעָ֔ם <S%H463><s%> of Eliam אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> of Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> Hittite

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers וַיִּקָּחֶ֗הָ <S%H3947><s%> and took וַתָּב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> her and she came in אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> unto him and he lay עִמָּ֔הּ <S%H5973><s%> with וְהִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> she מִתְקַדֶּ֖שֶׁת <S%H6942><s%> with her for she was purified מִטֻּמְאָתָ֑הּ <S%H2932><s%> from her uncleanness וַתָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and she returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1004><s%> unto her house

וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> conceived הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman וַתִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> and sent וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הָרָ֥ה <S%H2030><s%> I [am] with child אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> to Joab שְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> [saying] Send אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> me Uriah הַחִתִּ֑י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֽוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> to David

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come אוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> And when Uriah אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וַיִּשְׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> demanded דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto him David לִשְׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> did יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> [of him] how Joab וְלִשְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> did הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and how the people וְלִשְׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> prospered הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> and how the war

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David לְא֣וּרִיָּ֔ה <S%H223><s%> to Uriah רֵ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> Go down לְבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> to thy house וּרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> and wash רַגְלֶ֑יךָ <S%H7272><s%> thy feet וַיֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> departed out אֽוּרִיָּה֙ <S%H223><s%> And Uriah מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַתֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> was sent אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> and there followed מַשְׂאַ֥ת <S%H4864><s%> him a mess הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> [of meat] from the king

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> slept אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> But Uriah פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> with all the servants אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> of his lord וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> and went not down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> to his house

וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> And when they had told לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> went not down אוּרִיָּ֖ה <S%H223><s%> Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> unto his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> unto Uriah הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> along אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you בָ֔א <S%H935><s%> Camest מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> how לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָרַ֥דְתָּ <S%H3381><s%> down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אוּרִיָּ֜ה <S%H223><s%> And Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David הָ֠אָרוֹן <S%H727><s%> The ark וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> abide בַּסֻּכּ֗וֹת <S%H5521><s%> in tents וַאדֹנִ֨י <S%H113><s%> and my lord יוֹאָ֜ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab וְעַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> and the servants אֲדֹנִ֨י <S%H113><s%> of my lord עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> in the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> fields חֹנִ֔ים <S%H2583><s%> are encamped וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> shall I אָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> then go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּיתִ֛י <S%H1004><s%> into mine house לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and to drink וְלִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> and to lie עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אִשְׁתִּ֑י <S%H802><s%> ess חַיֶּ֙ךָ֙ <S%H2416><s%> liveth וְחֵ֣י <S%H2416><s%> and the life נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> I will not do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> to Uriah שֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> Tarry בָּזֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> here גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> here to day וּמָחָ֣ר <S%H4279><s%> also and to morrow אֲשַׁלְּחֶ֑ךָּ <S%H7971><s%> I will let thee depart וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode אוּרִיָּ֧ה <S%H223><s%> So Uriah בִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּמִֽמָּחֳרָֽת׃ <S%H4283><s%> and the morrow

וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> had called ל֣וֹ דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And when David וַיֹּ֧אכַל <S%H398><s%> him he did eat לְפָנָ֛יו <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֵּ֖שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> and drink וַֽיְשַׁכְּרֵ֑הוּ <S%H7937><s%> him and he made him drunk וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> he went out בָעֶ֗רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and at even לִשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> to lie בְּמִשְׁכָּבוֹ֙ <S%H4904><s%> on his bed עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> with the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> of his lord וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָרָֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> but went not down

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> And it came to pass in the morning וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> that David סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> a letter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> to Joab וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> [it] by the hand אוּרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H223><s%> of Uriah

וַיִּכְתֹּ֥ב <S%H3789><s%> And he wrote בַּסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the letter לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֽוּרִיָּ֗ה <S%H223><s%> ye Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> against פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> the front הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> battle הַֽחֲזָקָ֔ה <S%H2389><s%> of the hottest וְשַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H7725><s%> and retire מֵאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> ye from him וְנִכָּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> that he may be smitten וָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> and die ס

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּשְׁמ֥וֹר <S%H8104><s%> observed יוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> And it came to pass when Joab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> that he assigned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> א֣וּרִיָּ֔ה <S%H223><s%> Uriah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> unto a place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> where he knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> that valiant שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> And the men הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> of the city וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <S%H3898><s%> and fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> with Joab וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> and there fell מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and some הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> [some] of the people מֵעַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> of the servants דָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיָּ֕מָת <S%H4191><s%> died גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also אוּרִיָּ֥ה <S%H223><s%> and Uriah הַחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite

וַיִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> Then Joab וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> all the things הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> concerning the war
